an10.80:1.3: ‘Anattham me acari, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti,
an10.80:1.4: ‘anattham me carati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti,
an10.80:1.5: ‘anattham me carissati, tam kutettha labbha’ti aghatam pativineti,
an10.80:1.8: carissati, tam kutettha labbhati aghatam pativineti, appiyassa me amanapassa attham acari …pe…
an10.80:1.10: attham carissati, tam kutettha labbhati aghatam pativineti,
